actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A concurrent resolution to express the sense of the Congress that the Federal Reserve Board should adopt a monetary policy to reduce interest rates to reasonable levels.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System should reexamine its monetary supply policy and roll back interest rates to reasonable levels to enable small businesses and individuals to obtain needed capital.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution to express the sense of the Congress that the Federal Reserve Board should adopt a monetary policy to reduce interest rates to reasonable levels.
